Articles.Content:
First try.

Using the [KAPAS-75](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=8828.0) mod and [Kosmos Space Station Parts Pack V3](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=7178.0) for the Space Station Module and [KW Challenger Pack](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=2680.0)

But i ran out of RCS fuel before the final approach ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) (Still learning orbital rendezvous)

> 
> (Almost) rendezvous
> 
> ![screenshot51t.png](http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/2659/screenshot51t.png)
> 
> Launch Vehicle
> 
> ![launchvehicle.png](http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/520/launchvehicle.png)
> 
> Orbiter
> 
> KAPAS-75 Docking Mechanism
> 
> Space Station Module
> 
> Reentry Vehicle
> 
> Fuel, engine, autopilot, zoxygene systems
> 
> ![orbiterc.png](http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/6920/orbiterc.png)
> 
>

Put a big station in orbit earlier tonight; gosh i love this game. I am however on my crappy laptop that runs the game at lowest settings at a crawl and will set up my other modules when i transfer back over to my desktop 8)

some pics for my first post:

[http://imgur.com/a/v1xPF](http://imgur.com/a/v1xPF)

in orbit

![vHBAG.png](http://i.imgur.com/vHBAG.png)

the discarded main stage

![TbBa3.png](http://i.imgur.com/TbBa3.png)

the shroud

![ojRx5.png](http://i.imgur.com/ojRx5.png)

has 3 full RCS tanks, SAS, and a full service modual and engine for deorbit or reorbiting

launching this took so much paitence as my display drivers crashed twice during the initial launch and the lag was so bad i only had to make minor adjustments
